mechanics.outcome: Create 60ft radius sphere of bright light, extending to 120ft radius of dim light

mechanics.condition: Point chosen on an object that is held OR not worn/carried
mechanics.outcome: Light source originates from and moves with that object

mechanics.condition: Light source is an object AND object is completely covered by an opaque object
Overlap with area of darkness created by a spell of 3rd level or lower

description_text: A 60-foot-radius sphere of light spreads out from a point you choose within range. The sphere is bright light and sheds dim light for an additional 60 feet. If you chose a point on an object you are holding or one that isn't being worn or carried, the light shines from the object and moves with it. Completely covering the affected object with an opaque object, such as a bowl or a helm, blocks the light. If any of this spell's area overlaps with an area of darkness created by a spell of 3rd level or lower, the spell that created the darkness is dispelled.
